isis.stitle: TSI 93-06-01 - New Design Universal Joint Lubrication Valve

subjectgroup.subject: New Design Universal Joint Lubrication Valve

geninfo.para: The Spicer universal joint lubrication valve design has been changed ( Figure 1) with new vehicle production approximately September 1992, on all 1610 thru 1880 Series universal joints. The new design provides for a positive retention of the valve within the journal cross and enhances joint re-lubrication as journal grease purging will be more readily achieved.
The new lubricant valve has a positive effect on the lift and performance of the universal joint.
The new design will not change any installation or maintenance procedures that are currently in effect.
